name: Annihilape
author: Shiburingaru
flavor_text: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

abilities.name: Lose Cool
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has 2 or more damage counters on it, attacks used by this Pokémon do 120 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Impact Blow
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Impact Blow.
